commitResults.messageTitle: Added Greet, Echo and Exit functionality
commitResults.messageBody: console formatting class and bot command functionality
store a list of the user inputs and list all inputs
added ability to mark and unmark task and option to switch to dio bot

commitResults.messageTitle: Added Todo, Event and Deadline functionality
commitResults.messageBody: added handling of different type of task, modified structure of task accommodate for the different tasks

commitResults.messageTitle: Tested UI Testing and fixed todo
commitResults.messageBody: fixed todo printing wrong output
implement 'mark' invalid input and out of range exception, added overall empty input exception and invalid suffix exception.

commitResults.messageTitle: Added Delete feature, and further testing
commitResults.messageBody: implement delete feature and update error message to show warning symbol and restructure the printing of task left to be generic for usage in deletion. Testing of the new functions and ensure correct output

commitResults.messageTitle: Organize and Restructure error checking code
commitResults.messageBody: move error checking into individual methods for organization
implement storage class which saves and load the tasklist.
change variable name to make more sense
implement deadline and event to work with localdate and localtime.

commitResults.messageTitle: Restructure classes to become more OOP
commitResults.messageBody:
Duke class: extract out console, command & parser class.

Extracting the different classes allow each class to handle their individual functionality. This allows for easier troubleshooting and re-use of code (inheritance).

Storage, Console, Command, DukeException classes is affected by OOP restructuring. Output of commands is encapsulated in a class 'BotMessage' and Command word and format is encapsulated in their individual subclasses of Command.

Other minor changes: clean up code spacing.
Divide all classes into multiple packages due to the increase number of classes.

Parser class methods did not use the constants provided.

Make methods use constants to make it easier for user to change date time format.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JUnit testing and Fix name merge issues
commitResults.messageBody:
Require testing for classes to ensure proper behaviour of code.

Implement ParserTest,  DukeTest and DeadlineTest to test functionality of Parser, Duke and Deadline classes.

Other info
- Add a static formatMessage method to Console.
- Extract Duke commandFeedback handling into a method.
- Add a method to all commands to get command name.
- Fix naming issues in BotMessage and Add missing @Override tag in Task

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix Storage loading wrong file path and minor issues
commitResults.messageBody:
Storage class was loading the wrong file path, /data/taskInfo instead of <user.dir>/data/taskInfo. This results in Storage initializing creating the file at the wrong location compared to file read/write.

Other info
- Fix Console print issue (print instead of println).
- Fix JUnit testing to match with Console print.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update code to comply with standard and minor bug fix
commitResults.messageBody: Split .* to individual imports and make storage class throw exception when directory and file cannot be created.
Add JavaDoc comments to the code.
Add a command to list the task that matches with the user input specified.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update JavaDoc for new Find command
commitResults.messageBody: Update the bot messages to have a javadoc header for the find methods.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix AJar and Add missing comment for FindCommand
commitResults.messageBody:
Add missing parameter description for the FindCommand class

Add manifest file for AJar artifact build as shadow jar file was unable to run.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix build.gradle file to allow jar build to work
commitResults.messageBody: build.grade file path to the duke.java class was not correct.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update code to match CheckStyle requirements
commitResults.messageBody: lots of stuff being updated in code to adhere to check style requirements

Restructure UI (Console) and Duke class to work with new GUI implementation with FXML.

Features added
- GUI interface, text box for user input, scroll bar for looking through all messages, send button to send the input message to the bot.
- Each bot have their own image file

Other Info
- Rename Console class to UI class
- Move Task List printing to TaskList.toString().

commitResults.messageTitle: Format code to adhere code quality standards
commitResults.messageBody: Update JavaDocs of new methods in duke and package certain classes.

Allows to document important assumptions that should hold at certain points in the code.

This can be used to track the program state so that the runtime can verify these assumptions.

Add assert at: 
- Delete command to track size validity.
- Parser to track blank inputs.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update Exit command after GUI changes
commitResults.messageBody:
Exit command was not updated during the GUI update.

This allows user to use the command line to close the application instead of pressing on the 'x' button.

Implemented 'bye' command to call a delay function to close the application after a certain time.

Other info
- Fix build.gradle to be able to use gradle to build a jar file.
- Fix message displayed in GUI

commitResults.messageTitle: Add CI and Remove text-ui-test due to GUI Changes
commitResults.messageBody:
Remove text-ui-test due to GUI changes
Change yml file to exclude text-ui-test

Implement stats feature to allow user to view their task statistics information.

Create a StatsCommand, UserProfile class to store the necessary information of the user and facilitate the displaying of the information in the UI.

Modify the storage system to store user information instead of only task list information.

By extracting the data conversion into their respective class of Task, TaskList, UserProfile, this allows organisation in the code.

Other info
- Update JavaDocs of StatsCommand and missing JavaDocs

GUI does not visually differentiate error message and bot responses. GUI images is a little too big which result in lesser space for the responses.

Add error message checking which allows the highlight of error messages, turning dialog box to a light pink color. Modify images to be rounded and reduced in size.

This enables user to easily differentiate error messages due to the color differences and allows more information to be displayed at once due to the smaller image.

Other info
- Add window title
- Rename method names (proper naming)

Update readme to contain todo, deadline, event features and descriptions.

Other info
- Command input to lower case
- Additional formatting for visual display

Update readme to contain find, mark, delete, exit, bot, list features and descriptions.

Other info
- Additional formatting for visual display
Fix minor formatting issue of readme.
Minor documentation fix for launcher class.
